author: Tero Laxström <tero.laxstrom@visit.fi>
name: angular-image-mask
description: angular-image-mask - An AngularJS directive to draw paths and masks over an image

scripts.build: npm run build:jshint && npm run build:browserify && npm run build:templates
scripts.build:jshint: jshint src/main.js src/mask.js src/shape.js src/polygon.js src/point.js src/control.js src/editcontrol.js src/polycontrol.js src/line.js src/linecontrol.js src/rectangle.js src/rectcontrol.js
scripts.build:examples: npm run build && npm run build:examples-copy && npm run build:examples-libs
scripts.build:examples-copy: cp -a examples dist/ && cp dist/angular-image-mask.js dist/examples/ && cp -a templates dist/examples/ && cp -a img dist/examples/
